channel.title: CVE Feed for uri-template-lite -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-43309|2024-08-04T03:55:29.287Z -- uri-template-lite -- uri-template-lite
item.description: An exponential ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) can be triggered in the uri-template-lite npm package, when an attacker is able to supply arbitrary input to the "URI.expand" method
